titles.title: To extend the temporary protected status of certain nationals of foreign states designated under section 244 of the Immigration and Nationality Act, and for other purposes.
TPS Extension Act of 2018
TPS Extension Act of 2018
TPS Extension Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary:
TPS Extension Act of 2018
This bill amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend temporary protected status (TPS) through September 15, 2021, for eligible nationals of countries currently designated for TPS.
TPS designation permits eligible nationals of designated counties affected by armed conflict or natural disasters to temporarily reside and work in the United States.
